Company.title: Company
Company.description: Represents a company using the application.

ownerId.description: The UID of the user who owns the company.

address.description: The physical address of the company.

phone.description: The contact phone number for the company.

companySize.description: The number of employees in the company.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the company was created.

Invite.title: Invite
Invite.description: Represents an invitation for a user to join a company.

email.description: The email of the user being invited.

companyId.description: The ID of the company the user is invited to.

role.description: The role assigned to the user upon joining.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the invite was created.

Material.title: Material
Material.description: Represents a type of construction material.

name.description: Name of the material (e.g., Concrete, Steel).

unit.description: Unit of measurement for the material (e.g., cubic meters, tons).

costPerUnit.description: Cost per unit of the material.

category.description: The category of the material (e.g., Cement, Steel).

supplier.description: The name of the material supplier.

currentStock.description: Current quantity of the material in stock.

minStock.description: Minimum required stock level for the material.

projectId.description: The ID of the project this expense belongs to.

userId.description: The ID of the user who logged the expense.

amount.description: The monetary value of the expense.

category.description: The category of the expense (e.g., Labor, Materials, Equipment).

description.description: A detailed description of the expense.

expenseDate.description: The date the expense was incurred.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the expense was logged.

userId.description: The ID of the user this notification is for.

projectId.description: The ID of the project this notification belongs to.

description.description: A detailed description of the notification.

timestamp.description: The timestamp when the notification was created.

read.description: Whether the user has read the notification.

link.description: A URL to navigate to when the notification is clicked.

icon.description: The name of the lucide-react icon to display.
